item.title: 教皇狮子座猛击特朗普的伊朗罢工：“战争不能解决问题” - 《每日野兽》
item.description: 教皇狮子座猛击特朗普的伊朗罢工：‘战争不能解决问题’＆nbsp; 每日野兽 教皇狮子座敦促国际外交阻止'无法弥补的深渊'＆nbsp; reuters '停止战争的悲剧，'教皇在我们加入伊朗战争后说＆nbsp; 国家天主教记者 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipgFBVV95cUxNQVJldnNwMUt1RjBSeFFUV1cyU29jOERFQ3JZbWsxUkluSWVUYU1OTE9zZFVFTTJ4N1p0VEt4MnUxSUl taddyufbwu3nmug53oejzyu5hme1yrthjvlpsewf0te8twlp5wlcwbzrfmdhcr3btbfgt CNVZSXH3A041ZHFLOERSQKFGDHL4Z2FMUXV6Q3VMDKJ0X1FBOFJRWHJYOE51EMZR？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>教皇leo xiv：‘人类哭泣并为和平辩护'＆nbsp; 梵蒂冈新闻 教皇狮子座在美国罢工之后称重伊朗＆nbsp;＆nbsp; barron's

item.title: 大马士革教堂的自杀炸弹炸弹至少杀死15人 - 路透社
item.description: 大马士革教堂的自杀炸弹至少杀死15 ＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitAFBVV95cUxPSTRZOUY0RHJOb2psa3gxTVRIcURLZlRHNVZjejdKR29Cc0EwOUVoQUgzaWpPM1Z6UVlSU2RxZElsTDRBQ2FGU3ZtW F9KeTBpeE5QeVRKTEJhUXBuSlAwX01ybWI0b3hmYlhPWG5GdVpSbGZiUDBaRE9lcVhkSWloOEZ SZKH3UKJ1RJM4TGFABVU4CKHORXNOY0VLDC1NU0KYMMSYWWRXZ18ZMNBSQKHNWNRFVWM？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>至少有15人报告在大马士革教堂的ISIS自杀炸弹爆炸中死亡＆nbsp; nbsp; 以色列时代href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmixwfbvvv95cuxqx0pvdgfzbm0tsmvsmvsueffd WSXT09INUFPVGOYWTJKU3KTSTGTZGZNZDZDZPYMJZSMZSMZYTLP1RWXOAFNHU2WWEWUE45EGVUSHPJRDRZV0U4B hrhnvlazxztu2tzy3hundbhthhfuvrpme94alfaetrsuznqyznqyzlfltlty5cfzmbk1kahzmn24zavc5r0zqo gr6umzeve4lvfuz2jsymtqmuxaqzris21pnw94eu16nfzyszjpzjpzfnctksfnctkswrfprpprpprtgi0yuvszejf？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ blank”>自杀炸弹袭击者在弥撒期间大马士革附近的叙利亚教堂袭击叙利亚教堂，州媒体说＆nbsp; 叙利亚：目击者说＆nbsp; nbsp; dw.com 叙利亚教堂的自杀炸弹袭击者至少杀死9 ＆nbsp; nbsp; CBS News

item.title: 北约与5％的国防支出目标同意海牙峰会声明 - 路透社
item.description: 北约与5％的国防支出目标同意海牙峰会声明，外交官说＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 北约成员同意将国防支出增加到5％＆nbsp; dw.com <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxPbm1wSENsMDl3RXl4Z0g1d3YtLU1uN2N3OXNlSzBUcElzRjNiQWdkTEhOalhXUzhteDM5UkdVSHNhMGJqb1 9ouxlyym1eumlidwffeet5r1bmv0vfb1u1cw5gclpqzjbxv2v2v0rvkwsjjjjj jjj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj jj j beb1beb1dke JQ1Q3LZYZAWD1JRTHLXM1ZXRWTQLUP4QVVUMTG5UKVENM0XUEDABGFGZWZWZWD3DHQQ？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普说我们不必达到北约支出目标＆nbsp; nbsp; politico 北约峰会的成功在西班牙拒绝国防支出的巨大远足之后＆nbsp; ap ap news ap news

item.title: 据报道，伊朗在美国袭击之后关闭了霍尔木海峡 - politico.eu
item.description: 据报道，伊朗在美国攻击后移至hormuz的海峡＆nbsp; nbsp; politico.eu 据报道，伊朗议会是在石油运输通道的封闭＆nbsp; nbsp; axios 在美国对其核地点攻击后，伊朗可以关闭Hormuz的海峡＆nbsp; nbsp; forbes href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi3wfbvv95cuxpaurldkhwdgpkwllctks0mzc tyu1qexprmzxrti1a2pnzvkxdhntz1dtvlf3zwdxx3rbbdhlnw1zzdqng0tu1bnowo0s2vclthozg5obw hqvxpnddhptttzkegfzrhperkzuzuh3rtq4ai1xcurnnxixctnguw14c25lt0rzrgxvulphvexmwmo3yy14b 1pqbluxvgt6y29kn1v5uujuundmohlzeu91nxvslwfcothomknjogvxaflxrjiynk0yelvit2h0qwvcqvzy blu1elvztefyx1rr0ghkaufvx3lxte9jytlmuufhmunvquzes3leelfpzvy1mgnxnxh3mndwltliug50sdv McZnky0ZXR0W0RJNPM3LJA00XB1JKSKPKPKOVLXSFRODS1ZBFNLQM0YX1HESNVBRUZSAJLBYKPCOW9TB3BRRE 80TZZRC0TAY3LSRW1YUKRST2VJYWXWNDF3C1N2ATBUZZFOBXR0AGRLQ0XVR1L1L3VZK1ZGJYTKRJAJAJAJAJAJAJDCNUVAU C1ZC0DZNKHBRZM0AWNUB1PSBKS0V1FTSU5HSTDBZMTLTVZRNUJCVXC4TKJXTGLZUHBKQMHDDMFHTG？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>围绕阿拉伯半岛崛起的运输威胁，最大的全球船东组织警告＆nbsp; nbsp; cnbc 在与伊朗的危机中，美国军事官员专注于Hormuz海峡＆nbsp; nbsp; 《纽约时报》

item.title: 伊朗的最高领导人面临着他的决定性时刻 - 财务时期
item.description: 伊朗的最高领导href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiigfbvv95cuxoaza4vfvksgvksgvusng0am9ku2jfvlpsowdhothgbgrqawzymgrqawzymghimghimfhmrzvxoevxoevxoevxoevxoevxoevquququququququququququququququ hrvthhlclh3c2i4em1iuk5sude0ndn5sm1lv19xzflzvlftul9zqw5oczbvzbvzbvz1lqcelcel6agm1ndzwvhjiv3jkutfqwji1u1u0jzdzgzvhjaeepsugptque？ target =“ _ blank”> ayatollah ali khamenei，计划他可能暗杀，选择继任者＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmivgfbvvv95cuxpbgfvyvpqekzmexptu0 n4nezhc0hkdunktfcyzzhhhvuy5ehhqltlrsw1wu2fkdlhwt3itedfxntlknzrszf9sme1yndv5z2h abku4b1uwnlrtmg1dy3nyvexwsxvjz3jvdxptuwfwumfjefhfrkvmzdjodmpouwn5mxdvwdffzouey efnxc2mtegzkb2pmcs1dzmqtzuh2ef9xvnbiqznythbkcg5wzzc1mflvmwpzovlwmkzcrxhb？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普说，伊朗的主要核网站'被美国的灭绝了' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmimgfbvv95cuxnyk04tk1qvxgxgtvdnpdexodgzvm205bffnvvxyjvvxyjvvvxyjvvvxyjv6r2 jjfwndkq q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q YjljZ1ZsS2I2Nmh3RkwtSUlPaDlQZG8tUjlzdGNJbE1jYk1oV3ppWS1Ob1FkR3MyaDEzOGRnbzM3LTR6dzFLbFZObmg3U192TnN4c0xKd1E5X1dhYmpmeHdu sjhzdu4ymerhzuf30ggfaufvx3lxte9odkpwvg5bwu5bwu5bemjxulf0sfnmrunkskffltklxrgqwcebhf3nzfkrc1tlxlxlxlxhyvujpdgg1iruzst3lzbjbjbjbjbjbjbjbjduuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu u u u EE5WQLNBM0T5TY1ENW1UZJUZZHDCUNZ3X3G2ADU0CXGWSEPNUNLRROGRCOTG5RVFPADHZZJEYCKVIBMFNZ0JBTDL2L2AE5AQWJNVJNVUZDR0L0L0LCRCRVY5AQDR0LCRCRVY5DDFFFFLQ？ Target =“ _ Blank”>以色列威胁要杀死伊朗的最高领导人。这是接下来的下一步 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMingFBVV95cUxNbF9veW9VenhLSHF0WHd1cnBvM0lHeTRqTzRKNGd0YkpvUllwWjR6cTdEQUg1dXpVR2tuQU9YY1 ZvZHQweWUweTY3WTloM1l4YktRaHBaenhFcjMySDY2dS1HNkxYS0Y2NTNQSW93LVRFTnJmQTdYek9ZLTB6TVNoeVdkMjRTdmtuaXVhck9aRF85amZoSWw1ZEFwYVNtZw?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>‘每个人都知道Khamenei的日子已经编号'＆nbsp;＆nbsp; the atlantic

item.title: 美国对伊朗核场地的攻击有多有效？视觉指南 - 监护人

item.title: 以色列恢复哈马斯在加沙持有的三个人质的尸体 - 《纽约时报》

item.title: 在美国对伊朗的罢工之后，所有聚会都被禁止了，因为军事越来越限制 - 以色列时报
item.description: 在我们对伊朗罢工之后，所有聚会都被禁止，＆nbsp; nbsp; 以色列时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi5afbvv95cuxpq24tzv82cziwdk9bugp0ev9yendynvf rcklvckhjsjsjronxfvndzsn2pqtmvqmjmjivnewvwplaflaflkt1zuteltvxrymhbfrm9kn1rxvujtnmrvamrvamrjcte1albft UK0YNPDVWKXZ0HSYXN4UZBNTTQTBXAWBNUYDZV5TZFTAKPMAEGYWMDXEUR1BNDOEF9VVVUXCDDLKBTFVQTGQTGQTGQTG0BNP33TP3TATA tuzflbhlqag5AMXJPZ2Z3DY0TQJFSSMVLQVB1YNPUAEY3TDRMUTBXU3BCQ3NXCUHLRKG4BE1VDXVTNDK0C3A？ target =“ _ blank”> IDF首席：以色列在我们罢工之后达到了一个'转折点'，但是仍然有'仍然需要完成的目标'＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 以色列时代 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMijAFBVV95cUxNU2trN2duUjc0NWprRGQxdkU5WnVVd095OU5TRkFMbmJsdHpvSVNBTUxqNHA3UX BMTDV2WEDILUTURG9WXY1YRNVRVRVRVCFBBLH2BZVOCZBMNHVYNKDGAENNANA3GYZEJ1AI02DGJIZM52TXDXDTXDUT0TMWWW56NUVAZLAZLAZLOYCLOYCLDWTZDNZDNZDNZDNZDNZDNZDNZDNZDNZDNZDNZDNZ0LWWWWWWFFJLWWWWWWWWWWWWWWFJLUW？ Target =“ _ Blank”>一些以色列人期望在美国对伊朗罢工后的新时代。其他人持怀疑态度。＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报 对3个受美国罢工击中的伊朗核地点有什么了解 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiugFBVV95cUxOemhLd3c2NHZvTTB2aW5JRVdEYUk1cmJ6WldUcERKcHVXYW5iTFk2bUZ2VElvZGNsZjI1S3ZlQThndEhmST LNC19PCM9KYUNHXZA4LXLXNM1INNPVMW5SZNV3NZNDNFFXYJD2U201SNBSNBSCDRTEEXOMU9Y ovuxt1blcnnwlvhjanrydk1poevzngngngm1vwllbwlvdvxrqtgzvluzvluzvluzn0n3owgyn0rlsgw 1UHZKYLJ1NU1VB2FSAB8BQVVFFMTLFHU3ZFVNDRZ2NXMJZHQUO3ODRZVZDDXDX2W2C2C2C2UWY mvftkrnakxpv09fzwdyvdrksuh5m0hltfziwflvofvkthdkev9obzf5bwj5bwj5ykhhaduzq2zr mwe1yjhfb1i4tu5uszjetmnluxlxzjfsqnvhxzlgov80tti1nu52vetmztlpzk9gevhyug 1YOC13BTBSDMM5N21OTVB3RVBCWM1RUXBLWFRLCUJOTVLKYVLKYVNORFPZCU9MEKLMYJA？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>以色列 - 伊朗更新：为伊朗准备'长活动'的以色列＆nbsp; al Jazeera

item.title: 部长说，英国在美国对伊朗的罢工之前通知，没有寻求帮助。
item.description: 英国在美国对伊朗的罢工之前已通知，没有帮助的要求，部长说＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS pm警告美国炸弹伊朗核网站之后的'升级风险' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwgfbvvv95cuxpwwtxb3pqtffcq3m5sfc ZS0K3TTBGYW1MSFDBVEZLEG9LTUZDYXEZBW1OSLVLSNVPLU9DEWZLC2V0V2TPWKX5SJRXZTZTZFUNH1ZX bxnjjjjmek3nk1scei1ewnsul8yx3lrngrfnxexa0hume9fyjhxvvhru3dotfjxsetiwvzwvzwulhsxbuz ZDTNUNYVL8YSDNOMVJMZZF2Q2L1ZG1XYMCWSK1DWWHPDWT3SI1FTWTAYMLWTAYMLWT0DRAGXTWNL2DW？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>凯尔·斯塔默（Keir Starmer href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiugFBVV95cUxQRm9rTXZlekY2QXRFXzBVTHBjdV90YzZmQmZ4a3RoYzNFRERsNG9NR2dsSW9ORkdYbFRJZUttVXE4X3d2azNPOGFGLVQ0V 2NTczFOMWpkZGhNYWVWRlRTd0tWcjY3azl3RndCQjFOQWRvRW5OQUJjeFBUX2Rzcy1aV2t1SEhya tywuhb3x1phn0phu2hqdnvyr0hsttfirefzegdpv0nwmzlhc25icgn1bdl0tgxbd1rmmwc？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”> starmer：英国将军事设备移至中东以保护其利益＆nbsp; nbsp; 以色列时代 每当斯泰默（Starmer）希望我们认为特朗普最好的时候，美国总统证明他是错误的＆nbsp; nbsp; 独立

item.title: 中国对伊朗冲突的反应更加讨论西部，与击败其德黑兰艾莉-MSN的报应

item.title: 印第安人伸展，呼吸和平衡以标记国际瑜伽日 - 美联社新闻
item.description: 印第安人伸展，呼吸和平衡以标记瑜伽的国际日＆nbsp; nbsp; ap news ‘一个地球，一个健康'：瑜伽日在动荡的世界中提供喘息的喘息＆nbsp; un News 日本总理的妻子在东京举行国际瑜伽日庆祝活动，有2,000多名参与者＆nbsp; nbsp; 印度时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi0gfbvvv95cuxqalz2d0dnwdjus3fyweppmmvov 2dnlw9nmnnnwcvngwjhlulbjbzrtyuhpymlwvldiu3hvmdbpwhhsmwtnukvcme4zy2y4ahviaxhchcvvr0n3dpv KR2U2NLTFBLD0O3AGOWAUPIVDCYETBVZKVXTEFLBXHBTKMYUUJZMWP4STVPWK5FATVMTJN5EUU11TGVFFYWS3Z FDACTDHMG5OEVLFNLE4UFLHR3PEWUSYQWRTEJCXYZDPEG1VMVHHNSWHSWHSSDMXFXRFZRFZWV0RJSGVXEGJLV2C？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>在印度，成千上万的庆祝国际瑜伽日＆nbsp; nbsp; lemonde.fr 国际瑜伽天2025年 - 在图片中
